SprinkleProp_bg.description: Set the element's background color. Only accepts predefined color tokens starting with `bg.` (e.g., `bg.default`, `bg.accent`, `bg.error`), or the special values `current` and `transparent`.

SprinkleProp_borderColor.description: Set the element's border color. Only accepts predefined color tokens starting with `border.` (e.g., `border.default`, `border.accent`, `border.error`), or the special values `current` and `transparent`.

SprinkleProp_color.description: Set the element's text color. Only accepts predefined color tokens starting with `fg.` (e.g., `fg.default`, `fg.accent`, `fg.error`), or the special values `current` and `transparent`.

SprinkleProp_fontFamily.description: Set the element's font family. Only accepts predefined fontFamily tokens.

SprinkleProp_fontSize.description: Set the element's font size and line height (both properties are set together). Only accepts predefined fontSize tokens.

SprinkleProp_gridColumn.description: Set the element's size across grid columns

SprinkleProp_gridTemplateColumns.description: Control number of columns in a grid layout

SprinkleProp_h.description: Set the element's height. Only accepts predefined size tokens.

SprinkleProp_m.description: Set the element's margin on all sides. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_maxH.description: Set the element's maximum height. Only accepts predefined maxSize tokens.

SprinkleProp_maxW.description: Set the element's maximum width. Only accepts predefined maxSize tokens.

SprinkleProp_mb.description: Set the element's bottom margin. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_ml.description: Set the element's left margin. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_mr.description: Set the element's right margin. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_mt.description: Set the element's top margin. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_mx.description: Set the element's left and right margin. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_my.description: Set the element's top and bottom margin. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_p.description: Set the element's padding on all sides. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_pb.description: Set the element's bottom padding. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_pl.description: Set the element's left padding. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_pr.description: Set the element's right padding. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_pt.description: Set the element's top padding. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_px.description: Set the element's left and right padding. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_py.description: Set the element's top and bottom padding. Only accepts predefined spacing tokens.

SprinkleProp_rounded.description: Set the element's border radius. Only accepts predefined borderRadius tokens.

SprinkleProp_shadow.description: Set the element's box shadow. Only accepts predefined boxShadow tokens.

SprinkleProp_size.description:
Set the element's width and height. Only accepts predefined size tokens.

When width and height are the same, use `size` instead of setting both
`w` and `h` separately (e.g., prefer `size="24"` over `w="24" h="24"`).

SprinkleProp_transition.description: Control which CSS properties should transition

SprinkleProp_w.description: Set the element's width. Only accepts predefined size tokens.

SprinkleProp_z.description: Set the element's stacking order. Only accepts predefined zIndex tokens (e.g., popover, toast, tooltip) or numeric values (0, 10, 20, 30, auto).

!!.description: Truthy check - returns true if value is truthy (not null, undefined, false, 0, or empty string)

ProteusAtomicCondition.description: Simple comparison condition - single operator only (used in OR arrays to avoid recursion)

or.description: Logical OR - returns true if any condition is true

and.description: Logical AND - returns true if all conditions are true

ProteusCondition.description: Condition for Show component. Can be a comparison operator, logical AND, or logical OR. Supports nesting.

examples.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
examples.title: Submit Feedback

appIcon.description: A visual representation of the application

appName.description: The official name of the application

blocking.description: If true, hides chat prompt and forces user interaction with document. User can press ESC or close to abandon.

subtitle.description: A brief description or tagline that provides additional context about the Proteus document's purpose.

title.description: A concise heading that encapsulates the essence of the Proteus document's content or intended action.

ProteusElement.description: A single Proteus UI component element identified by its $type discriminator

tool.description: Name of registered tool to call

message.description: Message to send to LLM via sendNewMessage()

ProteusEventHandler.description: Handler for user interactions - either a server-side tool call or client-side message

ProteusNode.description: A Proteus node can be a string, number, boolean, null, a single element, or an array of these types (similar to ReactNode)

appearance.description: Control the appearance by selecting between the different button types.

onClick.description: Action triggered when button is clicked

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the text input field

description.description: Provide description and help text for the field.

info.description: Display a help icon with additional context for the input.

required.description: Display an asterisk for required inputs.

alignItems.description:
Set the element's `align-items` CSS property. Defaults to `center` when
`flexDirection='row'`, and `stretch` when `flexDirection='column'`.

flexDirection.description:
Set the element's `flex-direction` CSS property.

Default: 'row' (CSS standard)

level.description:
Heading level (1-4) that controls both the semantic HTML tag and font size.
- `level="1"`: renders `<h1>` with `fontSize="4xl"` (default)
- `level="2"`: renders `<h2>` with `fontSize="3xl"`
- `level="3"`: renders `<h3>` with `fontSize="2xl"`
- `level="4"`: renders `<h4>` with `fontSize="xl"`

Use `asChild` to decouple the semantic level from visual appearance.

addonAfter.description: Display content inside the input at the end.

addonBefore.description: Display content inside the input at the start.

appearance.description: Control the appearance of the input.

name.description: The name of the form control element.

placeholder.description: The placeholder text to use when control has no value.

children.description: Template object to render for each item in the array. Value paths are relative to current item.

marks.description: The marks to display on the range steps.

max.description: The maximum value for the range.

min.description: The minimum value for the range.

step.description: The stepping interval for the range.

name.description: The name of the inner select element.

options.description: The select items/options we want to render.

value.description: Return a unique key for each item

children.description: Content to show when condition is true

when.description: Single condition or array of conditions (AND logic). Each condition is an object with one operator key.

maxRows.description: Limits the height of the textarea when `resize=auto` is used.

name.description: The name of the form control element.

placeholder.description: The placeholder text to use when control has no value.

resize.description: Control whether resizing mode is manual, automatic, or disabled.

rows.description: The number of rows to display.
